products.name: Mop & Glo Multi-Surface Floor Cleaner Fresh Citrus Scent Squirt Bottle

extendedInfo.detail: Ready to use. 3-in 1 cleans, shines and protects. Shine lock formula provides a long lasting shine! Helps protect against everyday scratches. Mop & Glo multi-surface floor cleaner with shine lock formula gives you the beautiful floors you deserve in one quick and convenient step. Health. Hygiene. Home. 3-in-1 cleans shines protects. Hardwood. Tile. Laminate. Contains less than 0.1% phosphorous. Questions? 1-800-228-4722. For more ingredient information visit: www.rbnainfo.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, Modified Acrylic Polymer, Trideceth-3, Etoxydiglycol, Oxidized Polyethylene, Maleic Modified Rosin Resin, Zinc Oxide, Fragrance, Ammonium Hydroxide, Benzisothiazolinone, Partially Flourinated Alcohol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Polyethoxylated Methyloctadecylammonium Methyl Sulfate.
extendedInfo.directions: Types of floors: Safe to use on tile, laminate, vinyl, hardwood, marble, linoleum, ceramic, and no wax floors. Not recommended for unsealed/worn wood r unsealed ceramic surfaces. Test in an inconspicuous area first and follow manufacturerÛªs instructions. Directions: Before applying MOP & GLO triple action, vacuum or sweep the floor. Squeeze out a small amount of MOP & GLO directly onto the floor. Use a damp mop to spread the product evenly over a 3 inches x 4 inches area of the floor. Rinse the mop into a bucket to remove the dirt. Move to the next area of the floor and repeat the process. Your floor will normally dry to a beautiful shine in 10-20 minutes. Helpful Hint: If your floor is very dirty, clean first with a floor cleaner. Try Lysol all purpose cleaner, and then use MOP & GLO triple action floor shine cleaner. If your floor shows signs of build up or discoloration regularly remove the older layers of polish with the following process: mix 1/4 cup of Lysol all purpose cleaner and 1 cup ammonia in 1/2 gallon of warm water and spread over floor (do not mix bleach-based cleaning products with ammonia).
extendedInfo.warnings: Keep out of reach of children.
